document.full_text: russia's rosneft  vowed to push ahead with a strategic alliance with bp , despite a block on the deal by the british oil company's partners in joint venture tnk-bp .
document.title: russia's rosneft to push ahead with bp arctic pact
lines_and_colors: russia's rosneft  vowed to push ahead with a strategic alliance with bp , despite a block on the deal by the british oil company's partners in joint venture tnk-bp .
